tags.name: Advices
tags.description: API to list advices by category and language

get.description:
Returns a list of all advices.

- If no `language` is provided, all languages are returned.
- If `language` is provided (`en`, `pt`, `es`), only that language is returned.
- If `category` is provided, use format `lang:categoryName` (e.g., `en:motivational`).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter advices by category. Use format `lang:categoryName`, e.g., `pt:motivacional`.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Return advice in specified language (`en`, `pt`, `es`). If omitted, returns all languages.

title.example: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step

description.example: No matter how big the dream...
